person_say: I’m about to give an important presentation, but I’m really nervous. Do you have any tips for relaxation and focus?
animal_say: I know just the friend for you! There's a wonderful bear named Bruno, a mindfulness specialist, who can help you reduce anxiety and find your focus. Want to meet him?

person_say: Yes, meeting Bruno sounds lovely! I would love to get some calming mindfulness tips from him.
animal_say: Alright! Here comes Bruno, the mindfulness master! Get ready to relax and breathe deeply with his calming tips!
